GV01rvpp_02u:1080: ayā | te | agne | vidhema | ūrjaḥ | napāt | aśvam-iṣṭe | enā | su-uktena | su-jāta // RV_2,6.2 //
GV01rvpp_02u:1089: saḥ | bodhi | sūriḥ | maghavā | vasu-pate | vasu-dāvan | yuyodhi | asmat | dveṣāṃsi // RV_2,6.4 //
GV01rvpp_02u:1103: īḷānāya | avasyave | yaviṣṭha | dūta | naḥ | girā | yajiṣṭha | hotaḥ | ā | gahi // RV_2,6.6 //
GV01rvpp_02u:1141: mā | naḥ | arātiḥ | īśata | devasya | martyasya | ca | parṣi | tasyāḥ | uta | dviṣaḥ // RV_2,7.2 //
GV01rvpp_02u:1142: viśvāḥ | uta | tvayā | vayam | dhārāḥ | udanyāḥ-iva | ati | gāhemahi | dviṣaḥ // RV_2,7.3 //
GV01rvpp_02u:1143: śuciḥ | pāvaka | vandyaḥ | agne | bṛhat | vi | rocase | tvam | ghṛtebhiḥ | āhutaḥ // RV_2,7.4 //
GV01rvpp_02u:1144: tvam | naḥ | asi | bhārata | agne | vaśābhiḥ | ukṣa-bhiḥ | aṣṭāpadībhiḥ | āhutaḥ // RV_2,7.5 //
GV01rvpp_02u:1145: dru-annaḥ | sarpiḥ-āsutiḥ | pratnaḥ | hotā | vareṇyaḥ | sahasaḥ | putraḥ | adbhutaḥ // RV_2,7.6 //
GV01rvpp_02u:1149: vājayan-iva | nu | rathān | yogān | agneḥ | upa | stuhi | yaśaḥ-tamasya | mīḷhuṣaḥ // RV_2,8.1 //
GV01rvpp_02u:1150: yaḥ | su-nīthaḥ | dadāśuṣe/ ajuryaḥ | jarayan | arim | cāru-pratīkaḥ | āhutaḥ // RV_2,8.2 //
GV01rvpp_02u:7506: rājānau | anabhi-druhā | dhruve | sadasi | ut-tame | sahasra-sthūṇe | āsāteiti // RV_2,41.5 //
GV01rvpp_02u:7537: tā | naḥ | ā | voḷham | aśvinā | rayim | piśaṅga-sandṛśam | dhiṣṇyā | varivaḥ-vidam // RV_2,41.9 //
GV01rvpp_02u:7587: tīvraḥ | vaḥ | madhu-mān | ayam | śuna-hotreṣu | matsaraḥ | etam | pibata | kāmyam // RV_2,41.14 //
